import React from 'react'; import { fashionArray } from './FashionArray' import { Carousel } from 'react-bootstrap'; function Fashion() { const handleSelect = (selectedIndex, e) => { setIndex(selectedIndex); }; let newFashion = fashionArray; return ( {/* fashion section start */}
{/*

) })}
*/}

) }) }
{/* fashion section end */} ) } export default Fashion
